titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Management Reorganization Act of 1993
National Aeronautics and Space Administration Management Reorganization Act of 1993
To promote and support management reorganization of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Science, Space and Technology discharged.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Mr. Hall (TX) asked unanimous consent to discharge from committees and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Senate Committee on Commerce discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SP 1239 proposed by Senator Biden for Senator Glenn.
Amendment SP 1239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Passed Senate amended. National Aeronautics and Space Administration Management Reorganization Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to establish a separation pay program to encourage eligible employees to voluntarily retire or resign from NASA.
